game.name: Cool Cat Cafe
game.desc: Description: Work as a purrista at a cat cafe! Controls: * Arrow Keys - Move * X - Use / Activate * Z - Take the drink out of the coffee pot * P - Pause menu. Allows selecting 2-player mode * ESDF - Move (player 2) * Q - Use / Activate (player 2) * Tab - Take the drink out of the coffee pot (player 2)
